is a town just north of
, most famous for its 24-hour dance party at the steakhouse, Andrés Carne de Res.

value: content=Andres Carne de Res is actually a little out of town in the town of Chia, but the trip is well worth the effort. Movers, shakers and the beautiful people descend on the sprawling bar, grill and restaurant nightly. Each floor is lavishly decorated  according to its given theme: el Inferno (hell), la tierra (land), and el cielo (heavens). The vibe is amazing, and once you are done eating the dancing goes on until the wee hours. Make sure you have someone to take you home again. Prices equivalent to a high end steak house in the United States.
